about_the_game:
In the beginning of the game you wake up in space and an unknown entity sends you to explore mysterious locations.

project_Structure_01 is a first-person exploration game that takes a minimalist approach to storytelling and gameplay, instead focusing on immersing the player within a captivating and introspective environmental experience. Eschewing traditional narrative conventions, the game invites players to navigate a series of surreal liminal spaces imbued with a unique atmosphere and brutalist architectural style.

At the heart of the project_Structure_01 experience is a profound sense of exploration and discovery. Players must traverse the game's meticulously crafted environments, which blend elements of haunting ambience and soothing tranquility. The soundscape, composed of haunting and relaxing ambient tracks, seamlessly enhances the player's sense of presence, complementing the visual and spatial design.

Through its minimalist approach and focus on environmental immersion, project_Structure_01 offers a contemplative and deeply engaging exploration experience. Players are invited to become lost in the game's captivating liminal spaces, allowing the atmosphere and architectural design to guide their journey of discovery.

Features:
ㆍHaunting and relaxing ambient tracks
ㆍLiminal spaces experience from first-person perspective
ㆍOccasional 3D platforming sections
ㆍFun optional collectibles
